metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000035 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Tiny Tiny RSS before 829d478f is vulnerable to XSS window.opener attack

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tt-rss - 17.1+git20170410+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tt-rss package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.1+git20170410+dfsg-2').
